underlying_goal: To understand the paraphrase strategy recommendations in CLAUDE.md and clarify whether the claimed performance improvement relates to diversity metrics (Vendi score) or actual sandbagging detection performance.
primary_success: Correctly identifying the subtle but critical distinction that the documented performance improvement was for the Vendi (diversity) score, not the main sandbagging detection metric.
brief_summary: The user asked about paraphrase strategy recommendations in CLAUDE.md. Claude located the recommended strategies and a claim about a 40% performance improvement. When questioned by the user, Claude correctly clarified that this improvement was for a diversity metric (Vendi score), not the primary detection metric.
